name: Flying Fire Captain Hero Game
description: Be the fire superhero and save the city from huge destruction. Be the fast pace captain and rescue the people that are stuck in the flaming buildings. Go and rescue the girl that need your help and kill the other robot heroes that are trying to smash the city and rule over there. Multiple fighting scene along with superheroes rescue mission. Be the fire super hero and attack on the enemies by using your fire abilities to win that futuristic fight and save the people that are hostage and need the flying hero help. Multiple tasks to do and save the people that are your real strength.
